allowClear.description: Allow the user to clear their input.

autoFocus.description: Autofocus to the block on page load.

disabledDates.description: Disable specific dates so that they can not be chosen.

min.description: Disable all dates less than the minimum date. Can be a date string or a _date object.

max.description: Disable all dates greater than the maximum date. Can be a date string or a _date object.

dates.description: Array of specific dates to be disabled. Can be date strings or a _date objects.

ranges.description: Array of array pairs of start and end dates be disabled. Can be date strings or a _date objects.

inputStyle.description: Css style to applied to input.

align.description: Align label left or right when inline.

extra.description: Extra text to display beneath the content.

hasFeedback.description: Display feedback extra from validation, this does not disable validation.

extraStyle.description: Css style to applied to label extra.

feedbackStyle.description: Css style to applied to label feedback.

format.description: Format in which to parse the date value, eg. "DD MMMM YYYY" will parse a date value of 1999-12-31 as "31 December 1999". The format has to conform to moment.js formats.

placeholder.description: Placeholder text inside the block before user types input.

showToday.description: Shows a button to easily select the current date if true.

suffixIcon.description: Name of an Ant Design Icon or properties of an Icon block to customize icon on right-hand side of the date picker.

title.description: Title to describe the input component, if no title is specified the block id is displayed.
